control.name: seCustomHeight
control.description: The CustomHeight property specifies the editor's height. By default, this property is set to -1, and the editor's height is calculated automatically to fit the editor's content.

control.name: seHIndent
control.description: The HorizontalIndent property specifies a horizontal margin between the border and text.

control.name: seVIndent
control.description: A vertical margin between the border and text.

control.name: gridControl1
control.description: To display RTF data assign the RepositoryItemRichTextEdit object to the ColumnEdit property

control.name: gridControl2
control.description: Handle the CustomDrawRowPreview event to manually paint preview sections or customize individual preview sections before painting them using the default mechanism.
